channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Trapped Vehicle; INC#1754; 10:37PM; 6201 N Owensmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O0isI1; Woodland Hills; Two car traffic collision with four patients (2 in each vehicle) trapped and in critical condition. Firefighters are conducting extrication operations. Ages/genders unknown at this time.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E106 E293 E305 E72 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA104 RA106 RA107 RA72 RA73 RA96 T105 T93 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Hiker Rescue; INC#1597; 09:34PM; 3000 Reseda Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1R9NA; Pacific Palisades; Due to the terrain and urgency (hoist operation taking a longer time to execute), LAFD Air Operations is landing on a flat, dirt area next to Reseda Blvd. Firefighters on the ground and LAPD will control traffic for safety. The 55yo male patient will be transported in grave condition. No further details.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 E109 E293 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA93 RH114 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#1597; 08:41PM; 3000 Reseda Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1R9NA; Pacific Palisades; Firefighters located and provided advanced life saving care to a 55yo male patient in grave condition due to medical distress (not trauma) and are now moving him by ground to an awaiting helicopter to conduct a hoist operation for air ambulance transport. ; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 E109 E293 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA93 RH114 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1114; 03:51PM; 870 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D4U5mi; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters extinguished the Greater Alarm structure fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. The preliminary searches found no victims in either structure (home and converted garage). No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC13 BC18 BC4 BC9 CM52 E205 E226 E229 E261 E294 E450 E52 E58 E6 E88 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA29 RA34 RA5 RA61 T26 T29 T5 T61 T94 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1023; 03:52PM; 476 W Solano Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JPAMRM; Elysian Park; CONTAINED: Firefighters have hand lines completed around the fire perimeter. The size is estimated at 5 acres. Firefighters will continue with mop up operations to address any remaining hot spots. LA Co FD camp crews are responding to assist with establishing the fire line (all vegetation removed down to 'mineral soil') to ensure no extension beyond the contained area. There are no injuries reported and no structures damaged. ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CE59 CM20 CM22 E1 E11 E15 E16 E20 E201 E202 E220 E290 E38 E4 E42 E44 E47 E55 E56 E90 EA1 EM1 H2 H3 H4 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA1 RA209 RA3 T1 T2 T20 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1114; 03:48PM; 870 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D4U5mi; Koreatown; There is a well established attic and converted garage fire in the two story, craftsman (vacant) style home. Firefighters are in the offensive mode in this Greater Alarm structure fire. There are no injuries reported.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC13 BC18 BC4 BC9 CM52 E205 E226 E229 E261 E294 E450 E52 E58 E6 E88 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA29 RA34 RA5 RA61 T26 T29 T5 T61 T94 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 07/07/2023 INC#1053

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#1053; 03:42PM; 11732 W Pierce St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NKwyMg; Lake View Terrace; FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED: Firefighters from ANF and LAFD have stopped all forward progress of the fire. The final estimated acreage is not available at this time. There are no injuries reported and no structures damaged. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 CE83 CM40 CM42 DZ45 E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E77 E90 E91 E98 EM14 H0A H0D HE1 HE2 RA7 RA898 RI200 T74 T75 T98 WT77 WT88; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire - ANF; INC#1053; 03:38PM; 11732 W Pierce St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NKwyMg; Lake View Terrace; The fire is still estimated at 3 acres burning slowly uphill with 10% containment. ANF and LAFD are in Unified Command with the incident being in the Mutual Threat Zone.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 CE83 CM40 CM42 DZ45 E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E77 E90 E91 E98 EM14 H0A H0D HE1 HE2 RA7 RA898 RI200 T74 T75 T98 WT77 WT88; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1114; 03:37PM; 870 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D4U5mi; Koreatown; Two story, single family dwelling with fire showing from the attic and the rear of the house. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and additional resources are enroute.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 CM52 E226 E229 E261 E450 E52 E58 RA29 RA61 T26 T29 T61; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1086; 03:29PM; 4251 N Beeman Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O5GBx4; Studio City; KNOCKDOWN: 20 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 RA78 RA878 T60; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart
